paragraphs.body: This is the page where formal nominations for adminship are recorded and archived. An explanation of what administrator or "sysop" rights are can be found at the ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: This is the page where formal nominations for adminship are recorded and archived. An explanation of what administrator or "sysop" rights are can be found at the administrator project page.

paragraphs.body: There are no concrete requirements for a user to be an administrator. However, administrators will usually:
paragraphs.text: There are no concrete requirements for a user to be an administrator. However, administrators will usually:

paragraphs.body: Fruipit will now become Avatar Wiki's 22nd administrator.
paragraphs.text: Fruipit will now become Avatar Wiki's 22nd administrator.

paragraphs.body:
I, AvatarKatar, nominate Hasdi for adminship on Avatar Wiki. He is smart, dedicated, civil, nice and all around good choice for administrator on the site. He's a logical choice and would serve this community well. His knowledge of the terms of the site can benefit it, as he is an active member and usually checks the site for the most recent updates and community happenings. He is also very knowledgeable of other outside sources giving him the ability to seek out information on a subject if required and would almost always detect uncivil behavior among the community.
AvatarKatar (wall • contribs) 02:22, July 4, 2014 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, Lumoshi, nominate Fruipit for adminship on Avatar Wiki. Throughout my time here, I have seen nothing but substantial and helpful contributions to the wiki, especially to the fanon portal. If it wasn't for gold usernames, I would have thought she was an admin already! I think she would be a wonderful administrator on Avatar Wiki. Lumoshi (talk) 02:43, July 4, 2014 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, Suzon99, nominate HammerOfThor for adminship on Avatar Wiki. HoT's dedication to the wiki in times of inactivity, great work ethic, and approachability make him a great candidate to become an admin. HammerOfThor has a consistency on the wiki, a consistency of great edits, and great behavior. He knows his way around the wiki, and knows the policies like the back of his hand. For this, I say, there is no candidate more worthy of this tool than HammerOfThor. -- Suzon99 (talk • contribs) 02:54, July 4, 2014 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, PSUAvatar14, nominate HammerOfThor for adminship on Avatar Wiki. Thor has proven himself to be an exemplary contributor in his time here all across the wiki, getting involved wherever he can and, as was noted in his previous nomination, with a strong knowledge of the policies. He definitely has the capability of being an admin and this could very well be his time. PSUAvatar14 Want to have a word?  13:58, July 5, 2014 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, Suzon99, nominate Ziryerx for adminship on Avatar Wiki. Ziryerx is a great editor, who also happens to have the dedication required to serve the wiki with this tool. Ziryerx is a friendly person, and has a great grasp on the sites policies. Therefore, I think it would only be fair to nominate him for adminship. -- Suzon99 (talk • contribs) 03:11, July 4, 2014 (UTC)
